      • createEnclosure

        public TaskResourceV2 createEnclosure(RestParams params,
                                      AddEnclosureV2 enclosureDto,
                                      boolean aSync,
                                      boolean useJsonRequest)
        Description copied from interface: EnclosureClient
        The module aids in the creation of an enclosure when provided with the enclosure details as an AddEnclosure object or JsonRequest. It can process the request asynchronously or synchronously, based on the flag input.
        Specified by:
        createEnclosure in interface EnclosureClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        enclosureDto - The enclosure information that should be created.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        useJsonRequest - The JsonRequest body is part of AddEnclosure object which takes in a String containing the new enclosure details, which is converted to AddEnclosure object using adaptor and processed.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • updateEnclosure

        public TaskResourceV2 updateEnclosure(RestParams params,
                                      String resourceId,
                                      Enclosures enclosureDto,
                                      boolean aSync,
                                      boolean useJsonRequest)
        Description copied from interface: EnclosureClient
        The module takes in an enclosure object or JsonRequest and updates the existing enclosure based on the resource identifier. It can process the request asynchronously or synchronously, based on the flag input.
        Specified by:
        updateEnclosure in interface EnclosureClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for enclosure as seen in HPE OneView.
        enclosureDto - This is a object containing the update to be made to existing enclosure pointed to by the above mentioned resource identifier.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        useJsonRequest - The JsonRequest body is part of Enclosures object which takes in a String containing the update to be made, which is converted to Enclosure object using adaptor and processed.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • patchEnclosure

        public TaskResourceV2 patchEnclosure(RestParams params,
                                     String resourceId,
                                     Patch patchDto,
                                     boolean aSync)
        Description copied from interface: EnclosureClient
        The module takes in a Patch object or JsonRequest and updates the existing enclosure based on the resource identifier and the content of the Patch object. It can process the request asynchronously or synchronously based on the flag input.
        Specified by:
        patchEnclosure in interface EnclosureClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for enclosure as seen in HPE OneView.
        patchDto - This is a object containing the update to be made to existing enclosure pointed to by the above mentioned resource identifier.
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

      • updateEnclosureFwBaseline

        public TaskResourceV2 updateEnclosureFwBaseline(RestParams params,
                                                String resourceId,
                                                FwBaselineConfig fwBaselineConfigDto,
                                                boolean aSync)
        Description copied from interface: EnclosureClient
        This method aids in applying the firmware baseline to the enclosure. This method can be used to update the OA firmware, or the OA, logical interconnect, and server profiles in the enclosure. This is not applicable if enclosure is monitored.
        Specified by:
        updateEnclosureFwBaseline in interface EnclosureClient
        Parameters:
        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
        resourceId - The resource identifier for enclosure as seen in HPE OneView.
        fwBaselineConfigDto - fwBaselineConfig is the firmware baseline to be applied to the enclosure
        aSync - Flag input to process request asynchronously or synchronously.
        Returns:
        TaskResourceV2 containing the task status for the process.

                                   String resourceId,
                                   String scriptData,
                                   boolean aSync,
                                   boolean useJsonRequest)
        Description copied from interface: EnclosureClient
        The module aids in updating the configuration script for the specified enclosure resource identifier.
        Specified by:
        updateScript in interface EnclosureClient

        params - The RestParams is a structure containing the connection details.
